lyrics.stanza: Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go, Anywhere He leads me in this world below. Anywhere without Him, dearest joys would fade; Anywhere with Jesus I am not afraid.
Anywhere! anywhere! Fear I cannot know. Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go.
Anywhere with Jesus I am not alone, Other friends may fail me, He is still my own. Though His hand may lead me over dreary way, Anywhere with Jesus is a house of praise.
Anywhere with Jesus I can go to sleep, When the darkling shadows round about me creep Knowing I shall waken never more to roam, Anywhere with Jesus will be home, sweet home.
